summary: This is an email chain from July 2021 between an Assistant United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York and a contact named Tracy, discussing the search for a records custodian for FedEx records. The records pertain to a subpoena sent by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida to FedEx in February 2008 regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Tracy
persons.context: Addressed in an email by an Assistant U.S. Attorney seeking assistance in locating a records custodian for FedEx records related to a 2008 subpoena in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The FedEx records being sought are regarding Jeffrey Epstein, as indicated in the attached invoice filename.

connections.description: The AUSA is contacting Tracy to request assistance in locating a records custodian for FedEx documents related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: SDFL Subpoena to FedEx
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida sent a subpoena to FedEx, presumably for records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email Request for FedEx Records Custodian
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney for SDNY emails Tracy to seek assistance in locating the records custodian for the 2008 FedEx subpoena records.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida issued a subpoena to FedEx in February 2008 regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
In July 2021, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively seeking the records custodian for those FedEx records.
The email correspondence indicates ongoing investigative efforts into Epstein's activities years after the initial Florida investigation.
